level.heading: Reports to Superintendent of Banking and Financial Institutions.
level.text: All companies organized under this chapter, or which shall, under the provisions of this chapter, become entitled to transact the business of a trust company, shall report to the Superintendent of Banking and Financial Institutions pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 7 of this title.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-107, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 26-1352.
